text: Judgment Day (2000) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It took place on May 20, 2000 at the Freedom Hall in Louisville, Kentucky. It was the second Judgment Day event held by the WWF and the first to take place yearly. The show featured the return of The Undertaker, who for the first time appeared in his "American Bad Ass" gimmick. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 The British Bulldog defeated Joey Abs Singles match 4:28 2 Essa Rios and Lita defeated Kaientai (Taka Michinoku and Funaki) Mixed tag team match 5:02 3 The Godfather defeated D'Lo Brown Singles match 3:40 4 Too Cool (Scotty 2 Hotty, Grand Master Sexay and Rikishi) defeated Team ECK (Kurt Angle, Edge and Christian) Six-man tag team match 9:47 5 Eddie Guerrero (c) (with Chyna) defeated Perry Saturn and Dean Malenko Triple threat match for the WWF European Championship 7:56 6 Shane McMahon defeated Big Show Falls Count Anywhere match 7:11 7 Chris Benoit (c) defeated Chris Jericho Submission match for the WWF Intercontinental Championship 13:22 8 D-Generation X (Road Dogg, X-Pac and Tori) defeated The Dudley Boyz (Bubba Ray and D-Von Dudley) Double Tables match 10:55 9 Triple H (with Stephanie McMahon-Helmsley) defeated The Rock (c) 6-5 Iron Man match for the WWF Championship with Shawn Michaels as the special guest referee 1:00:00 === Iron man match === Score Point Winner Decision Notes Time 0–1 The Rock Pinfall
